alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Shawano; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Menominee, central Oconto and eastern Shawano Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Smokey Falls, or 13 miles northwest of Shawano, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Big Smokey Falls around 730 PM CDT. Keshena around 735 PM CDT. Legend Lake and South Branch around 740 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gillett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
